name: Analysis of Air Quality with R
body:
## Getting Started with R

This course is designed to help air quality analysts get started using R. No previous experience with R or any other programming language is required

### Day 1

* [Introduction to R](http://rpubs.com/kfrost14/IntroToR2) 

* [Data Types, Functions, & Importing Data](http://rpubs.com/kfrost14/DataTypesImport)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
